item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0499; 10:24AM; 20352 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jmRJJq; #Winnetka; Firefighters arrived to find a one-story home engulfed in flames, threatening neighbors. Firefighters rapidly deployed hose lines inside the burning building, while a company assigned to ventilation ascended ladders to the roof. Firefighters skillfully contained the damage to only the original structure, sparing all neighboring homes. Ultimately it took 38 firefighters 21 minutes to extinguish the blaze. All residents safely evacuated and there were no injuries. The residents will be displaced, but will be able to stay with nearby family. The cause is under investigation.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; AR1 AR21 AR7 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E104 E105 E273 E293 E305 E72 E84 EA1 EM17 RA104 RA84 T105 T73 T93; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0499; 10:03AM; 20352 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jmRJJq; #Winnetka; One-story single-family home, well involved with fire. Two additional task forces requested.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 CM42 E104 E105 E273 E293 E305 E72 E84 EM17 RA104 RA84 T105 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update Flooding; INC#1618; 11:00PM; 6050 W Fountain Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XYQxLl; #Hollywood; Electric Fire Engine 82 arrived at the address where a flooding was reported to find water flowing in the gutters, but did not see where it originated. As the crew heard the street rumble under the Fire Engine, the driver took off, just as a large hole appeared under them. The rear of the apparatus fell into the hole. The Rosenbauer Fire Engine, being the only all-wheel drive fire engine in the fleet, gained enough traction with the power going to the front wheels to pull itself out of the hole and drive clear of the hazard (sustained some damage to the rear). As water shot dozens of feet into the air, Firefighters received reports of a woman trapped in a home being pounded by the falling stream of water. Crews were able to rescue her, without injury. Her home has now sustained a roof collapse and severe flooding. A SAVE card has been issued to help her with temporary lodging. Thankfully, neither firefighters nor residents were injured during this incident.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E82 RA827 T27; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1666; 10:27PM; 3765 S Vinton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RC3UhZ; #Palms; Twenty-two LAFD firefighters extinguished a fire in 15 minutes, which appeared to have started in a dumpster in or near a first floor carport, and burned an auto and damaged the exterior of the building. Firefighters were able to contain the flames before they made it inside any of the units. Some smoke did affect the upper floor, and firefighters are assisting with ventilation to return fresh air to the residential structure. No reported injuries.; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E292 E43 E58 E62 RA43 T92; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1666; 10:12PM; 3765 S Vinton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3RsXJfY; #Palms; Two-story garden-style with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E292 E43 E58 E62 RA43 T92; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

Flooding; INC#1618; 09:31PM; 6050 W Fountain Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XYQxLl; #Hollywood; Firefighters are on scene of a broken water main in the middle of the street, which is shooting water approximately 30 feet into the air. A sink hole appears to be forming (unknown if the hole in the street is growing?) and several homes in the area are being evacuated as a precaution. DWP, DOT, Building and Safety, and LAPD (Inc 4997) notified. ; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; E227 E82 T27; CH7; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#0491; 10:20AM; 8600 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YhtKtD; #Sunland; Firefighters successfully extricated an approximately 45-year-old male and transported him in critical condition. The second patient was an approximately 75-year-old female who was treated and transported in serious condition.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E274 E289 E298 E77 E98 EM12 H0E HR3 RA60 RA7 RA98 RH114 T74 T89 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#0491; 09:51AM; 8600 W Foothill Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YhtKtD; #Sunland; Two-vehicle collision with two patients (one trapped). Firefighters are working to extricate the trapped victim.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E274 E298 E98 EM12 HR3 RA7 RA98 T74 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1709; 11:16PM; 7257 N Hesperia Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jplHMI; #Reseda; Firefighters quickly knocked back the flames that were originally intense at the front of the structure. It took some additional time to chase fire that was inside the walls. Ultimately, it took 22 firefighters 16 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC17 E100 E103 E273 E293 E73 RA73 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1709; 11:00PM; 7257 N Hesperia Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jplHMI; #Reseda; Two-story single-family home, well-involved with fire.; FS 73; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC17 E100 E273 E73 RA73 T73; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange
